Title: Riphagen
Writer: Thomas van der Ree, Paul Jan Nelissen
Actors: Kay Greidanus, Jeroen van Koningsbrugge, Huub Smit, Britte Lagcher
Plot: The story about Riphagen, a cunning Dutch traitor during WW2 who helped Nazi round up Jews, stealing their treasures for himself. He destroyed Resistance groups, making many who pursued justice after the war look like fools.
